name: Sirenhead AR
description:
Ever wanted to have your own Sirenhead in your neighborhood?

No!? Yeah me neither! But here you go, try at your own risk!

This is more of an experience than a game as Sirenhead attacks you, but cool to see and try out nonetheless!

Big thanks to Trevor Henderson for creating the idea of Sirenhead and jQueary for making the model. I have used their assets and ideas freely in my own project, so I encourage you to go and check them out.

Trevor Henderson: https://www.instagram.com/trevorhenderson/

jQueary: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1865137680&searchtext=sir...
